title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
At most 1 out of 2 points may be earned for a response that includes both correct components without evaluation at t=1. title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
At most 1 out 2 points may be earned for only one correct definite integral and antiderivative pair.

The second point may be earned for numerical or symbolic evidence of correct antidifferentiation.

The third point requires evidence of considering the initial position ( 0,  0 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaaicdacaGGSa GaaGPaVlaaykW7caaIWaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaiOlaaaa@3AA9@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The first point may be earned for evidence of dy dx = dy dθ dx dθ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaadsgacaWG5b aabaGaamizaiaadIhaaaGaeyypa0ZaaSaaaeaadaWcaaqaaiaadsga caWG5baabaGaamizaiabeI7aXbaaaeaadaWcaaqaaiaadsgacaWG4b aabaGaamizaiabeI7aXbaaaaaaaa@4152@ without an explicit statement.

The third point requires that dx dt =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaadsgacaWG4b aabaGaamizaiaadshaaaGaeyypa0JaaGimaaaa@38CC@ but dy dt ≠0.
